title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4021.6 - Unrecognized meeting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 4021.6 - Unrecognized meeting

State Regulations
(a) If a horse
runs at any unrecognized meeting, such horse is disqualified for all races to
which this Article applies. (b) Any
person owning, training or riding horses that run at any unrecognized meeting
is disqualified, as are also all horses owned by or in charge of any such
person. (c) Any person acting in
any official capacity at any unrecognized meeting may be
disqualified. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
4021.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
